game.name: Zombie Killers
game.description:
Oh no! The entire world might get into big trouble. Experts say that an unknown virus has already entered in most of the countries across the world. These dead surfers are walking around and ready to catch any living thing. The problem is that the brain of human beings is their favorite dish. Today a brave and lovely soldier has to leave their home for important work. Now you have to help him to avoid getting his brain eaten by the undead.

Would you think that you are capable enough to take care of this task confidently? If yes, join Zombie Killers and be prepared to guide him to survive for as long as possible. We understand that the entire area is already occupied by a horde of zombies. All you need to do is liquidate this undead and do everything as you can do to the lives of yourself and your fellow warriors. The best part is that your chances of survival will increase with the saving of the lives of each new member of your group.

Your bravery will also help you grab some powerful weapons which will make your job easier further. Keep clearing all the levels to get all of the bonuses available in the gameplay. Use all your powers to survive together with your team against the deadly zombies in different levels! The controls of this cool zombie game are pretty simple. You also do not need to do anything for shooting them since it managed automatically. Good luck to come out to attempt the most daring job of your life!
